text:
When the country was celebrating International Labour Day, Maharashtra witnessed a brutal (improvised explosive device) IED blast carried out by Maoists targeting a police vehicle in the Naxalite-infested Gadchiroli district on Wednesday. At least 15 Jawans and a civilian were killed in the blast.
BCCL
NCP chief Sharad Pawar Wednesday demanded Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis' resignation following the incident. "He should step down immediately", Pawar tweeted adding "Those who feel shame of conscience if not shame of public opinion would have resigned. But the people who are in power today are not going to do so."
BCCL
Everyone including Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Bollywood stars including Javed Akhtar and Swara Bhasker has condemned the attack.
